Package org.spongepowered.configurate.examples

Configurate usage examples. Non-API.

These are some examples of how to use Configurate, provided for informational purposes only. These may change at any time as new best practices are developed.

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FormatConversion
    An example of how to convert a configuration between two formats.
    ObjectMapperExample
    Example of how to use the ObjectMapper for a simple read-only configuration.
    Transformations
    An example of how to use transformations to migrate a configuration to a newer schema version.
    Tutorial  
    ValueReferences
